flawed_nl_solution:
He read 600/40=<<600/40=51>>51 hours per week
So now he reads 51-4=<<51-4=47>>47 hours per week
She now reads 40*1.5=<<40*1.5=60>>60 pages per hour
So she reads 47*60=<<47*60=2820>>2820 pages per week
#### 2820

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
